meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Barb Cornell Cash Tilton Bob Hunt Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2727.

td.p: Barb Cornell, a registered nurse from Eugene, Oregon
Cash Tilton, a marketing writer originally from Rockwall, Texas
Bob Hunt, a trade commissioner originally from San Francisco, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $33,200)

tr.td: THE 1910s
SIMIAN CINEMA
INVENTORS
GEMS
STATE MOTTOES
SEA____
(Alex: First part of the word is "sea"; you have to come up with the second part.)
